notes: shadcn DatePicker is composed from Calendar + Popover + Button; vlting is a single integrated component
vlting includes built-in label, helperText, error state, and errorMessage support
vlting supports controlled and uncontrolled modes (value/defaultValue)

Closes on Escape key or click outside
